DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , reactogenicity immunogenicity booster dose GlaxoSmithKline ( GSK ) Biologicals´ pneumococcal conjugate vaccine co-administered booster dose DTPa-IPV/Hib ( Infanrix-IPV/Hib ) preterm born child age 16-18 month . This protocol post deal objective & outcome measure booster phase . The objective & outcome measure primary phase present separate protocol posting ( NCT number =NCT00390910 ) . Subjects participate study receive three dos pneumococcal vaccine primary study . The Protocol Posting update order comply FDA Amendment Act , Sep 2007 .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Safety Immunogenicity Booster Dose Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine Preterm Born Infants .
